span.span: The entity type of the collection.

summary.span: 表示位於關聯性 (Relationship) 之「多」端的物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects on the "many" end of a relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是代表一對多關聯性 (One-To-Many Relationship) 或多對多關聯性 (Many-To-Many Relationship) 之「多」端的特定實體 (Entity) 類型的物件集合。An is a collection of objects of a particular entity type that represents the "many" end of a one-to-many or many-to-many relationship. 導覽屬性會傳回 。An is returned by a navigation property. 您可以使用 方法，將相關物件載入 中。Use the method to load related objects into an . 若要儲存特定實體類型之物件的不相關集合 (例如 的結果)，請使用 類別 (Class) 的執行個體 (Instance)。To store an unrelated collection of objects of a specific entity type, such as the result of an , use an instance of the class. 可能會有對應的 。An might have a corresponding . 當 和 模型化相同關聯性的相對端時，關聯性的完整性就會在物件層級維護。When an and an model opposite ends of the same relationship, the integrity of the relationship is maintained at the object level. 這兩個類別會自動同步處理 (Synchronize)。The two classes are synchronized automatically. 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited. ## Examples 此範例為基礎。This example is based on the . 若要執行此範例中的程式碼，您必須已經將 AdventureWorks Sales Model 加入到專案中，並設定您的專案使用 Entity Framework。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要這樣做，請完成中的程序[如何： 手動設定 Entity Framework 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)並[如何： 手動定義模型和對應檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此範例會執行下列動作：This example does the following: 1. 建立兩個新的 `SalesOrderHeader` 實體並將它們加入至 `Contact` 實體。Creates two new `SalesOrderHeader` entities and adds them to the `Contact` entity. 2. 從與 實體相關聯的 `Contact` 中取得所有相關端。Gets all related ends from the that is associated with the `Contact` entity. 3. 逐一查看 的集合。Iterates through the collection of s. 4. 取得每個相關端的 。Gets the for each related end. 5. 使用 方法，從集合中移除其中一個實體。Uses the method to remove one of the entities from the collection. 6. 呼叫 方法來判斷此物件是否已經從集合中移除了。Calls the method to determine whether the object was removed from the collection. 7. 使用 方法來重新加入實體。Uses the method to add the entity back. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的這個公用建構函式 (Constructor) 是要在還原序列化物件圖形時供物件服務使用。This public constructor for is intended to be used by Object Services when deserializing object graphs. 您應該從導覽屬性中存取 的執行個體，而非使用這個建構函式。You should access an instance of from a navigation property instead of using this constructor. 若要儲存特定實體類型之物件的不相關集合 (例如 的結果)，請使用 的執行個體。To store an unrelated collection of objects of a specific entity type, such as the result of an , use an instance of .

summary.span: 將物件加入至集合。

span.span: Adds an object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將物件加入至 並且建立這兩個物件之間的關聯性。The method adds an object to an and creates a relationship between the two objects. 當來源物件附加至 執行個體時， 方法也會將此物件加入至 。When the source object is attached to an instance, the method also adds the object to the . 呼叫 時，這項作業就會在資料來源中轉譯成插入作業。This operation is translated into an insert operation in the data source when is called. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 建立、 新增、 修改和刪除物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1)。For more information, see [Creating, Adding, Modifying, and Deleting Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1). 方法可以在同一個物件執行個體上呼叫多次。The method can be called multiple times on the same object instance. ## Examples 此範例為基礎。This example is based on the . 若要執行此範例中的程式碼，您必須已經將 AdventureWorks Sales Model 加入到專案中，並設定您的專案使用 Entity Framework。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要這樣做，請完成中的程序[如何： 手動設定 Entity Framework 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)並[如何： 手動定義模型和對應檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 這個範例會建立兩個新的 `SalesOrderHeader` 實體、將它們加入至 `Contact` 實體，然後在移除物件之後，使用 方法，將此物件重新加入至集合。This example creates two new `SalesOrderHeader` entities, adds them to the `Contact` entity, and, after removing an object, uses the method to add the object back to the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend_add)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend_add)]

Public Sub Attach (entities As IEnumerable(Of TEntity))

param.name: entities
param.span: 物件內容中與來源物件相關之物件的集合。

span.span: Collection of objects in the object context that are related to the source object.

summary.span: 在內容物件中，定義物件與相關物件之集合之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines relationships between an object and a collection of related objects in an object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來在來源物件與相關物件的集合已經存在內容物件中時，定義物件與相關物件之集合之間的關聯性。The method is used to define relationships between an object and a collection of related objects when both the source object and the collection of related objects already exist in the object context. 若要在已經定義關聯性的位置附加物件或物件圖形，請針對 呼叫 方法。To attach an object or an object graph where the relationships are already defined, call the method on the . 若要建立與來源物件相關的新物件，請針對 呼叫 方法。To create a new object that is related to the source object, call the method on the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 如果集合已經填滿或部分填滿， 方法就會合併現有的實體與給定的實體。If the collection is already filled or partially filled, the method merges existing entities with the given entities. 給定的實體不會被視為相關實體的完整集合。The given entities are not assumed to be the complete set of related entities. 所有傳入的實體都必須處於 或 狀態中。All entities passed in must be in the or state. 只有當狀態管理員已經在追蹤關聯性執行個體時，才允許使用處於 狀態中的物件。Objects in the state are only allowed when the state manager is already tracking the relationship instance.

span.span: collection is .

exception.span: 來源物件或 集合中的物件是 或者不處於 或 狀態中。

span.span: The source object or an object in the collection is or is not in an or state.

exception.span: 如果概念結構描述中的關聯不支援這兩個型別之間的關聯性，就可能會發生這種情況。

span.span: This can occur when the association in the conceptual schema does not support a relationship between the two types.

span.span: The object being attached.

summary.span: 在物件內容中，定義兩個所附加物件之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two attached objects in an object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來在兩個物件已經存在物件內容中時，定義這兩個物件之間的關聯性。The method is used to define relationships between two objects when both objects already exist in the object context. 若要在已經定義關聯性的位置附加物件或物件圖形，請針對 呼叫 方法。To attach an object or an object graph where the relationships are already defined, call the method on the . 若要建立與來源物件相關的新物件，請針對 呼叫 方法。To create a new object that is related to the source object, call the method on the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 如果 已經載入物件， 方法就會合併物件與 中的現有物件。If the already has loaded objects, the method merges the object together with the existing objects in the . 所附加的物件不會被視為相關實體物件的完整集合。The attached object is not assumed to be the complete set of related entity objects. 與這個 相關聯的物件以及附加至此物件的所有物件都必須處於 或 狀態中。The object associated with this and all objects being attached to it must be in an or state. 只有當 已經在追蹤關聯性執行個體時，才能附加處於 狀態中的物件。Objects in the state can only be attached when the is already tracking the relationship instance. ## Examples 此範例為基礎。This example is based on the . 若要執行此範例中的程式碼，您必須已經將 AdventureWorks Sales Model 加入到專案中，並設定您的專案使用 Entity Framework。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要這樣做，請完成中的程序[如何： 手動設定 Entity Framework 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)並[如何： 手動定義模型和對應檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此範例中的中斷連結的集合附加`SalesOrderDetail`物件和中斷連結`SalesOrderHeader`物件到物件內容，並接著會定義之間的關聯性`SalesOrderHeader`物件和每個`SalesOrderDetail`物件。This example attaches a collection of detached `SalesOrderDetail` objects and a detached `SalesOrderHeader` object to an object context, and then defines the relationships between the `SalesOrderHeader` object and each `SalesOrderDetail` object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AttachRelatedObjects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#attachrelatedobjects)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AttachRelatedObjects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#attachrelatedobjects)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會執行下列動作： does the following: - 設定組旗標設為`false`。Sets the flag to `false`. - 從集合中移除所有實體。Removes all entities from the collection. - 從 中斷連結已移除實體與 擁有者之間的關聯性。Detaches relationships between removed entities and the owner of the from the . - 從相關實體中移除 的擁有者。Removes the owner of the from the related entities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法來比較指定的物件與已經位於集合中的物件。Uses the method to compare the specified object with the objects already in the collection. ## Examples 此範例為基礎。This example is based on the . 若要執行此範例中的程式碼，您必須已經將 AdventureWorks Sales Model 加入到專案中，並設定您的專案使用 Entity Framework。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要這樣做，請完成中的程序[如何： 手動設定 Entity Framework 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)並[如何： 手動定義模型和對應檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此範例會執行下列動作：This example does the following: 1. 建立兩個新的 `SalesOrderHeader` 實體並將它們加入至 `Contact` 實體。Creates two new `SalesOrderHeader` entities and adds them to the `Contact` entity. 2. 從與 Contact 實體相關聯的 中取得所有相關端。Gets all related ends from the that is associated with the Contact entity. 3. 逐一查看 的集合。Iterates through the collection of s. 4. 取得每個相關端的 。Gets the for each related end. 5. 使用 方法，從集合中移除其中一個實體。Uses the method to remove one of the entities from the collection. 6. 呼叫 方法來判斷此物件是否已經從集合中移除了。Calls the method to determine whether the object was removed from the collection. 7. 使用 方法來重新加入實體。Uses the method to add the entity back. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend_add)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend_add)]

summary.span: 取得包含在集合中的物件數目。

span.span: Gets the number of objects that are contained in the collection.

value.span: 包含在 中的項目數目。

span.span: The number of elements that are contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得目前位於本機集合中的實體數目，但是不會在資料來源中反映集合的大小。The property gets the number of entities currently in the local collection and does not reflect the size of the collection in the data source. 計數為零不一定表示相關集合是空的。A count of zero does not necessarily indicate that the related collection is empty. 若要判斷資料來源中的集合大小，請呼叫 方法或在查詢路徑中包含相關物件。To determine the collection size in the data source, call the method or include the related object in the query path. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1<!TEntity> CreateSourceQuery() cil managed
Public Function CreateSourceQuery () As ObjectQuery(Of TEntity)

summary.span: 傳回物件查詢，執行這個查詢時，它就會傳回存在目前集合中的相同物件集合。

span.span: Returns an object query that, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that exists in the current collection.
An that represents the entity collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是用來取得傳回相同物件集合之 的新執行個體。This property is used to obtain a new instance of that returns the same set of objects. 這個方法可以當做更複雜聯結 (Join)、聯合 (Union) 或篩選查詢的起點，也可以使用 選項，以中斷連結的狀態傳回相同的物件。This is useful as the starting point for a more complex join, union, or filtered query, or to return the same objects in a detached state by using the option. 用來篩選中的物件可讓您繫結的特定類型的物件。 is used to filter objects in an to enable you to bind only objects of a specific type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 將物件繫結至控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b)。For more information, see [Binding Objects to Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b). ## Examples 此範例為基礎的修改版本。This example is based on a modified version of the . 這個版本支援以 `Course` 為抽象型別的一類一表 (Table-Per-Type) 繼承。This version supports table-per-type inheritance with `Course` as an abstract type. 完成逐步解說中，若要修改的 School 模型，以支援使用本主題中的每一類一表繼承範例。Complete the walkthrough to modify the School model to support the table-per-type inheritance example used in this topic. 此範例示範如何使用中的篩選物件和僅繫結至特定類型的物件。This example shows how to use to filter objects in an and bind only to objects of a specific type. 如需此範例的完整版本，請參閱[如何： 將控制項繫結至衍生類型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09730c14-3b7b-4563-af4a-7ecfa4e34bd5)。For a complete version of this example, see [How to: Bind Controls to Derived Types](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09730c14-3b7b-4563-af4a-7ecfa4e34bd5).

exception.span: 當物件處於 狀態中。

span.span: When the object is in an state.
-or-

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Load(valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption mergeOption) cil managed

param.name: mergeOption
param.span: 指定這個集合中的物件應該如何與可能已經從針對相同 的先前查詢所傳回的物件合併。

span.span: Specifies how the objects in this collection should be merged with the objects that might have been returned from previous queries against the same .

summary.span: 使用指定的合併選項，將相關物件載入集合中。

span.span: Loads related objects into the collection, using the specified merge option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫內部`RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad`方法，然後再載入集合中，會驗證呼叫有正確的條件。This method calls the internal `RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad` method before loading the collection, which validates that a call to has the correct conditions. `RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad`方法確認：The `RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad` method checks that: * 有效存在。A valid exists. * 實體不在狀態。The entity isn't in a state. * 針對必須是才是來源實體。 for must be if and only if the source entity was . 如果來源實體已擷取的任何其他，則可以是任何內容，不過(比方說，實體無法載入之後而選項可以是).If the source entity was retrieved with any other , the can be anything but (for example, the entity could have been loaded with and the option can be ). * 如果`mergeOption`是，並不 「 已載入的實體和非空的不追蹤上並不 「 。If `mergeOption` is , isn't called on an already loaded entity and isn't called on a non-empty, not-tracked . 當集合中的物件已經載入，則方法會強制所指定`mergeOption`參數。When objects in the collection are already loaded into the , the method enforces the specified by the `mergeOption` parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 若要明確載入相關的物件，您必須呼叫`Load`導覽屬性所傳回的相關端點上的方法。To explicitly load related objects, you must call the `Load` method on the related end returned by the navigation property. 一對多關聯性，呼叫方法。For a one-to-many relationship, call the method on . 一對一的關聯性中，呼叫上。For a one-to-one relationship, call the on . 這樣就會將相關物件資料載入物件內容中。This loads the related object data into the object context. 您可以使用傳回的結果集合逐一列舉`foreach`迴圈 (`For Each...Next` Visual Basic 中) 有條件地呼叫`Load`方法和結果中的每個實體的屬性。You can enumerate through the collection of returned results using a `foreach` loop (`For Each...Next` in Visual Basic) and conditionally call the `Load` method on and properties for each entity in the results. 方法會載入相關的物件資料來源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. > [!NOTE] > 於 (C#) 或 `foreach` (Visual Basic) 列舉期間呼叫 `For Each` 方法時，物件服務會嘗試開啟新的資料讀取器。When you call the method during a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) enumeration, Object Services tries to open a new data reader. 除非您在連接字串中指定 `multipleactiveresultsets=true` 啟用多個現用結果集，否則這項作業將會失敗。This operation will fail unless you have enabled multiple active results sets by specifying `multipleactiveresultsets=true` in the connection string. 您也可以將查詢的結果載入 集合中。You can also load the result of the query into a collection. 這樣會關閉資料讀取器，並且讓您列舉集合，以便載入參考的物件。This closes the data reader and enables you to enumerate over the collection to load referenced objects. 方法會與 方法同步處理。The method is synchronized with the method. ## Examples 此範例為基礎。This example is based on the . 若要執行此範例中的程式碼，您必須已經將 AdventureWorks Sales Model 加入到專案中，並設定您的專案使用 Entity Framework。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要這樣做，請完成中的程序[如何： 手動設定 Entity Framework 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)並[如何： 手動定義模型和對應檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 這個範例會載入 `SalesOrderHeader` 實體的相關 `Contact` 物件。This example loads the related `SalesOrderHeader` objects for the `Contact` entity. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithLoad](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#querywithload)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithLoad](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#querywithload)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Remove(!TEntity entity) cil managed
Public Function Remove (entity As TEntity) As Boolean

param.name: entity
param.span: 要從集合中移除的物件。

span.span: The object to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除物件並將關聯性標記為待刪除。

span.span: Removes an object from the collection and marks the relationship for deletion.

returns.span: 如果已順利移除項目則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if item was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法也會刪除來源物件與從集合中移除之物件之間的關聯性。The method also deletes the relationship between the source object and the object being removed from the collection. 如果此關聯性具有參考完整性 (Referential Integrity) 條件約束 (Constraint)，針對相依物件呼叫 方法就會同時將此關聯性和相依物件標記為待刪除。If the relationship has a referential integrity constraint, calling the method on a dependent object marks both the relationship and the dependent object for deletion. 發生這種情況的原因是，條件約束表示如果沒有父代 (Parent) 的關聯性，相依物件就無法存在。This occurs because the constraint indicates that the dependent object cannot exist without a relationship to the parent. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ReferentialConstraint 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24f96a80-85b5-4f2e-a14c-0e3eb6796fa0)。For more information, see [ReferentialConstraint Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24f96a80-85b5-4f2e-a14c-0e3eb6796fa0). 傳回`false`時指定的物件不在集合中。 returns `false` when the specified object is not in the collection. ## Examples 此範例為基礎。This example is based on the . 若要執行此範例中的程式碼，您必須已經將 AdventureWorks Sales Model 加入到專案中，並設定您的專案使用 Entity Framework。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要這樣做，請完成中的程序[如何： 手動設定 Entity Framework 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)並[如何： 手動定義模型和對應檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 這個範例會使用 方法，從集合中移除其中一個實體，然後呼叫 方法來判斷此物件是否已經從集合中移除了。This example uses the method to remove one of the entities from the collection and then calls the method to determine whether the object was removed from the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend_add)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend_add)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

An of entity objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會啟用 的資料繫結。This method enables data binding to an . 繫結至集合的控制項會呼叫此方法。It is called by the control bound to the collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 將物件繫結至控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b)。For more information, see [Binding Objects to Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b).
